Episodes.Title: Broken Bow, Part 1
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: In the mid-22nd century, the Earth ship Enterprise is launched under the command of Captain Jonathan Archer. When the crew rescues an alien from a crashed spaceship, Earth gets its first look at the alien's race - the Klingons. Ar...

Episodes.Title: Fight or Flight
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Captain Archer wants to convert curiosity into deeds and decides to enter a ship floating in space. Hoshi has trouble adjusting to life on Enterprise.

Episodes.Title: Strange New World
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Archer sends an away team to a habitable, luscious planet for observation. But when a storm occurs, the team begins to experience paranoid delusions.

Episodes.Title: Unexpected
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: After helping to repair the warp drive on board of a Xyrillian ship, Trip notices a strange bulging on his arm.

Episodes.Title: Terra Nova
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Enterprise tries to find out what happened on Terra Nova, the first colonization attempt outside Earth's solar system.

Episodes.Title: The Andorian Incident
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Archer, Trip and T'Pol are captured by the Andorians at a Vulcan monastery on P'Jem. They believe that the monastery is being used to spy on Andoria.

Episodes.Title: Breaking the Ice
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Enterprise discovers a comet which contains the very rare element eisilium. Then unexpectedly a Vulcan ship arrives. Captain Vanik tells they're interested in human behavior.

Episodes.Title: Civilization
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: T'Pol finds unusual neutrino readings on a planet with a preindustrial society.

Episodes.Title: Fortunate Son
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Enterprise is sent to help the freighter Fortunate after an attack. However, its first officer, Ryan, is hiding something.

Episodes.Title: Cold Front
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Enterprise has a group of aliens watching a stellar phenomenon on board. When the ship is miraculously saved from blowing up, crewman Daniels has an important message for Archer.

Episodes.Title: Silent Enemy
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: After an attack by a mysterious ship, Archers orders Enterprise's return to Jupiter to install phase cannons; Hoshi makes plans for Malcolm's birthday.

Episodes.Title: Dear Doctor
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Phlox is asked to save the Valakians from annihilation by disease. However, he discovers something unusual about the Menk, another humanoid race on the planet.

Episodes.Title: Sleeping Dogs
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Enterprise tries to rescue a Klingon ship from sinking into a gas giant.

Episodes.Title: Shadows of P'Jem
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: T'Pol is being recalled because of Enterprise's involvement in the destruction of the P'Jem sanctuary. She and Captain Archer are later kidnapped while visiting the planet Coridan.

Episodes.Title: Shuttlepod One
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: While returning to Enterprise in Shuttlepod One, Trip and Reed see apparent evidence that the ship has been destroyed. With only days of oxygen left, they must find a way to survive long enough for rescue.

Episodes.Title: Fusion
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: When Enterprise encounters a ship of Vulcan pilgrims, T'Pol is convinced by one of them to perform a Vulcan mind meld.

Episodes.Title: Rogue Planet
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Lieutenant Reed discovers a rogue planet, which has broken out of orbit and therefore is devoid of any light. Life is still possible in some places because heat is bubbling up from under the surface, but T'Pol doesn't detect any h...

Episodes.Title: Acquisition
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Almost the entire crew is left unconscious when four Ferengi pirates raid Enterprise. A still conscious Trip is the only one who can get rid of them.

Episodes.Title: Oasis
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: The crew of Enterprise searches for a seemingly abandoned ship on a desert planet.

Episodes.Title: Detained
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Archer and Mayweather are captured by the Tandarans and placed in a Suliban internment camp.

Episodes.Title: Vox Sola
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: A fibrous, web-like alien creature comes aboard the ship and several of the crew becomes entangled in it including Archer and Trip, and it seems Hoshi is the only one who can try to communicate with the creature.

Episodes.Title: Fallen Hero
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Enterprise is planning a trip to the relaxation planet Risa, when it gets an urgent request from the Vulcan High Command. They must pick up ambassador V'Lar who has fallen in disgrace. Apparently she misused her position during ne...

Episodes.Title: Desert Crossing
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Enterprise is for the second time on its way to Risa when yet again another urgent matter comes up: a distress call. It comes from a small vessel. The owner, Zobral, is extremely happy with the help from Enterprise and invites Cap...

Episodes.Title: Two Days and Two Nights
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: The members of the Enterprise crew are faced with various misadventures and challenges while taking a two day break from their duties on the planet of Risa.

Episodes.Title: Shockwave, Part I
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Enterprise discovers a mining colony of the Paraagans. The crew gets an invitation for a meeting on the surface and a shuttle pod tries to break through the atmosphere. All of a sudden just under the shuttle a giant explosion begi...
